content:
You're making great progress on keeping track of your connections.

Let's add Alex to your spreadsheet:

| Name | Email | Phone | Event | Date | Company | Notes | Follow-up Date | Last Contacted |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Rachel | rachel@example.com |  | TechConnect | 2023-02-10/11 | Old Company | Catch up and discuss new opportunities | 2023-02-20 |  |
| Jason | jason@startupx.com |  | TechConnect | 2023-02-10/11 | StartupX | Follow up on collaboration opportunities | 2023-02-20 |  |
| Alex | alex@edtechstartup.com |  | WeWork Startup Mixer | 2023-02-15 | EdTech Startup | Discuss potential partnership in edtech space | 2023-03-01 |  |

Remember to fill in the columns as you have more information. You can also add notes or reminders specific to your conversation with Alex, such as discussing his startup's focus or potential areas of collaboration.

As you continue to add more contacts, you might find it helpful to use filters or sorting to group your contacts by event, company, or industry. This can make it easier to identify connections and potential opportunities.

How's your spreadsheet looking so far? Do you have any other questions or need help with anything else?
